text: Eji, what’s troubling you tonight?
I heard Ragho quarreling with you today.
Hmm, yes. He does not lack ambition.
He may indeed take my place one day,
but to be a good leader he must<nl>learn to control his aggression…
Lord ni’Varra’s coming!
Father, are you sure you don’t need more guards?
We seek ancient knowledge, Arna, not battle.
Your brother’s troops are the finest soldiers in Saling.
You two take care.
Oh, my child, you never cease to amaze me.
But, Ganthu, it’s just a flower.
Flower or not, defying death is a miracle,
but don’t forget – even the<nl>smallest actions have their price.
Sir, your father’s coming.
Report, Commander.
Almost ready, sir!
My child, one day you will fulfill your destiny<nl>and I will be there to help you.
Ganthu, sometimes I try to<nl>picture myself in a prophecy but…
can one person be that important?
‘All is one’, as they say.
Perhaps you’re playing a role in a<nl>great story that started long ago
or even one that’s just about to begin…
